transfer.description: Transfers `amount` tokens from the caller's account to `recipient`.

transferFrom.description: Transfers `amount` tokens from `sender` to `recipient` on behalf of the caller.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given implementation address.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that `spender` is allowed to spend on behalf of `owner`.

approve.description: Sets the allowance of `spender` to `amount` tokens.

burn.description: Burns `amount` tokens from the caller's account.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places used by the token.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance of `spender` by `subtractedValue` tokens.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance of `spender` by `addedValue` tokens.

mint.description: Mints `amount` new tokens and assigns them to `account`.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

owner.description: Returns the current owner of the contract.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to `newOwner`.

Approval.description: Emitted when `spender` is approved to spend `value` tokens on behalf of `owner`.

OwnershipTransferred.description: Emitted when ownership of the contract is transferred from `previousOwner` to `newOwner`.

Transfer.description: Emitted when `amount` tokens are transferred from `from` to `to`.
